attributes.action: Give ALL ex-serving Gurkhas the right to remain indefinitely in the UK with full Pensions etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Gurkhas, currently being told that they are to be removed from the country should, without exception, be allowed to stay, with full pensions and treated as heroes.  Why are criminals and terrorists allowed to stay and yet these loyal, brave soldiers are being booted out of the country. It is a disgrace!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
